lead_paragraph: The remnants of the Schiaparelli lander seemed to appear on Mars in photos taken by a NASA orbiter, the European Space Agency said Friday.

headline.print_headline: Blotch on Mars Is Probably Craft’s Debris
headline.main: Dark Spot in Mars Photo Is Probably Wreckage of European Spacecraft

snippet: The remnants of the Schiaparelli lander seemed to appear on Mars in photos taken by a NASA orbiter, the European Space Agency said Friday....
abstract: European Space Agency says dark spot on Mars is likely remains of Schiaparelli spacecraft that crashed when attempting to land on planet; craft was part of ExoMars2016, joint mission between European and Russian space agencies.
